segments.text: Looking at this kitchen scene, everything seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the sink is full and water is spilling over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just gushing out onto the counter and floor without anyone stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is focused on polishing that plate with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea her apron is about to get soaked from the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, there are stacks of clean dishes waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the cabinet doors are wide open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out on that shaky two-step stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll come tumbling down with them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there beside him, her hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're like little conspirators in this domestic disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is neat and tidy, full of bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad thinking about the water damage to those pretty cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it all goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
